# iru_device_note (Resource)

Manages a Device Note.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "iru_device_note" "example" {
  device_id = "your-device-uuid"
  content   = "This is a note managed by Terraform."
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `content` (String) The content of the note.
- `device_id` (String) The UUID of the device.

### Read-Only

- `author` (String) The author of the note.
- `created_at` (String) When the note was created.
- `id` (String) The unique identifier for the Note.
- `updated_at` (String) When the note was last updated.
